original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ THE MOVIE
overview: A movie version of the original video psychic documentary series that explores the relationship between the allegedly disaster-causing footage and the death of a man who saw it. On the morning of July 22, 2002, a body was discovered in an alley behind a busy Tokyo street. Although the police were able to identify the corpse as Hara, a man in his thirties, they were unable to discover any cause of death.
tagline: Can you look directly at the truth projected by the camera?
title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ THE MOVIE
